Introduction

Yiren is a Chinese dancer and singer under Yuehua Entertainment. She is a member of the girl group EVERGLOW.

Yiren gained recognition after participating in MNET' survival show Produce 48, where she was distinguished as the #1 Visual Center by public vote. She was eliminated from the show after ranking 28th place.

She made her debut with EVERGLOW on March 18, 2019 with the release of their first digital single "Arrival of Everglow", and its title song "Bon Bon Chocolat".

On August 31, 2022, she embarked on her solo career with the release of her debut single, “Call Call”.
